mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.handover_no AS "handoverNo", a.transport_no AS "transportNo", a.customer_no AS "customerNo", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.sku_code AS "skuCode", a.order_qty AS "orderQty", a.actual_qty AS "actualQty", a.unloading_time AS "unloadingTime", a.receive_ship AS "receiveShip", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.base_org_id AS "baseOrgId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tm_handover_order_sku( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, handover_no, transport_no, customer_no, owner_code, line_no, sku_code, order_qty, actual_qty, unloading_time, receive_ship, org_id, rec_ver, base_org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{handoverNo}, #{transportNo}, #{customerNo}, #{ownerCode}, #{lineNo}, #{skuCode}, #{orderQty}, #{actualQty}, #{unloadingTime}, #{receiveShip}, #{orgId}, #{recVer}, #{baseOrgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tm_handover_order_sku SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, handover_no = #{handoverNo}, transport_no = #{transportNo}, customer_no = #{customerNo}, owner_code = #{ownerCode}, line_no = #{lineNo}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, order_qty = #{orderQty}, actual_qty = #{actualQty}, unloading_time = #{unloadingTime}, receive_ship = #{receiveShip}, org_id = #{orgId}, base_org_id = #{baseOrgId}, rec_ver = rec_ver + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
